question: ans 2 Q 6619 the name Uthmaan means "small bird" can you give this name as a 1 word name or must it be a 2 word name , if so what names can u use, also is it advisable to give this name to a child.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
The name Uthmaan is an appropriate Muslim name for a child. It may be given
as a one word name.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
